DOC.brief_title: The Psychosocial Economic Burden Genital Warts
DOC.detailed_description: Cervical cancer public health issue Brazil . The Cancer National Institute estimate cervical cancer second incident among woman , 18.430 new case 2010 . Human papillomavirus ( HPV ) relate cervical cancer also responsible benign lesion , genital warts.The Brazilian Ministry Health estimate prevalence genital wart 5,7 % among pregnant woman 21,5 % among woman attend sexually transmit infection treatment clinics.The study measure psychosocial burden genital wart use HPV Impact Profile questionnaire economic burden genital wart among woman attend six reproductive health clinic . There two study objective : 1 - measure psychosocial burden genital wart woman attend six reproductive health clinic Brazil . 2- measure economic burden genital wart treatment woman attend six reproductive health clinic Brazil . Hypothesis testing : For objective 1 , experiment compare difference psychosocial burden Genital Warts among subgroup therefore include formal hypothesis test psychosocial burden disease agreement extant literature subject ( Xingshu Zhu et al. , 2009 ) . Objective 2 aim measure differential economic burden disease among subgroups different type genital wart ( newly diagnose , recurrent resistant ) , site lesion , age , duration treatment , number medical visit , type number medical procedure . No formal hypothesis test .
